Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-19725 affecting package z3 for versions less than 4.13.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-19725 affecting package z3 for versions less than 4.13.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package z3 is earlier than 4.13.3-1, affected by CVE-2020-19725
